verbs.description: President Donald Trump [V: has] said the time and place has been set for his landmark meeting with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un – but kept the world guessing about when and where .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has [V: said] [ARG1: the time and place has been set for his landmark meeting with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un] – but kept the world guessing about when and where .
President Donald Trump has said the time and place [V: has] been set for his landmark meeting with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un – but kept the world guessing about when and where .
President Donald Trump has said the time and place has [V: been] set for his landmark meeting with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un – but kept the world guessing about when and where .
President Donald Trump has said [ARG1: the time and place] has been [V: set] [ARGM-PRP: for his landmark meeting with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un] – but kept the world guessing about when and where .
[ARG0: President Donald Trump] has said the time and place has been set for his landmark meeting with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un – but [V: kept] [ARG1: the world guessing about when and where] .
President Donald Trump has said the time and place has been set for his landmark meeting with North Korea 's Kim Jong Un – but kept [ARG0: the world] [V: guessing] [ARG1: about when and where] .
